summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and team leadership. Passionate about building scalable solutions and mentoring junior developers. Strong background in Python, JavaScript, and modern web technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Lead a team of 4 developers in building microservices architecture using Python and Docker
Improved system performance by 40% through code optimization and caching strategies
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain high code quality standards
Implemented automated testing frameworks reducing bug reports by 50%
Collaborated with DevOps team to deploy applications on AWS using Kubernetes

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 60%
Collaborated with product managers and designers to deliver user-focused features
Built RESTful APIs serving over 10,000 daily active users
Optimized database queries resulting in 30% faster page load times

experience.title: Junior Software Developer
bullets: Built responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Participated in agile development processes and sprint planning
Contributed to REST API development using Django framework
Gained experience in database design and SQL optimization
Collaborated with senior developers on code reviews and best practices

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
